Install apps.sudo apt-get update: update package lists (do this before apt-get install)

Text editors.nano [file name]: edit file [file name] with nano editor
Text editors.vim [file name]: edit file [file name] with vim editor
Text editors.mcedit [file name]: edit file [file name] with mcedit editor
Text editors.tilde [file name]: edit file [file name] with tilde editor

Node.nodeenv --node=[node version] env: Install node.js evironment (in the current folder)
Node.. env/bin/activate: Activate node.js evironment (in the current folder)
